description:
*⚡ Click SUBSCRIBE to Gain +1000 XP!* ► https://tinyurl.com/ft-falloutpwr-sub

In the new Fallout TV Show, Lucy appears to be a pretty powerful and capable hero. But, is she really? Just how powerful has Lucy become over the course of season 1 of Fallout. If we compare her story arc to the Fallout games like Fallout 4, Fallout 76, Fallout New Vegas, EXACTLY how powerful would she be in the show?
‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐‐
*Credits:*
Writers: Forrest Lee, Zach Stewart
Editors: Tyler Mascola, Danial "BanditRants" Keristoufi, Warak
Sound Designer: Yosi Berman

title: Film Theory: What Level is Lucy in the Fallout Show?
